roleset.name: inseminate/pollenate, cause to be fruitful

example.name: fecundate-v
example.text: 28 flowers with long styles, fecundated with pollen from flowers with long stamens, produced 28 capsules, each containing on an average 11-9 fertile seeds.
example.arg: with pollen from flowers with long stamens,

example.name: fecundation-n
example.text: 1st, He does not seem to be aware of the operation of insects in the fecundation of this family.

roleset.note: FECUNDATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
